word_mean: 在原本有森林覆盖但由于自然或人为因素而遭到破坏的立地上造林。

sentence.Network_en: China fir from mainland China are used here in reforestation work.
sentence.Network_cn: 该地用中国大陆的杉木以更新森林.

sentence.Network_en: The fire's worst scars were effaceable by a comprehensive program of reforestation.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过一项全面的重新造林计划,这场大火造成的最严重的疤痕可以修补起来.

sentence.Network_en: This province started to enclose the hills in a national park to allow natural reforestation.
sentence.Network_cn: 该省的一个国家公园已开始封山育林.

entry.tran: 重新造林;再植树;重新绿化
entry.def: Reforestation of an area where there used to be a forest is planting trees over it.

example.tran: 亚平宁山脉的重新绿化

means.word_mean: 1. the restoration (replanting) of a forest that had been reduced by fire or cutting

auth_sentence.content: We have been also working on reforestation programs.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have been also working on reforestation programs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have been also working on reforestation programs.

auth_sentence.content: The architects call the project an effort at metropolitan reforestation.
auth_sentence.res_content: The architects call the project an effort at metropolitan reforestation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The architects call the project an effort at metropolitan reforestation.

auth_sentence.content: But reforestation is crucial, he said, in preventing food insecurity.
auth_sentence.res_content: But reforestation is crucial, he said, in preventing food insecurity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But reforestation is crucial, he said, in preventing food insecurity.

sentences.en: Tree cutting organizations or private individuals shall, in accordance with the area, number of trees, tree species and period of time specified in the cutting license, finish the reforestation task; the area and number of trees in the reforestation shall not be smaller than those cut.
sentences.cn: 采伐林木的单位或者个人，必须按照采伐许可证规定的面积、株数、树种、期限完成更新造林任务，更新造林的面积和株数不得少于采伐的面积和株数。
